title: What are the effects of a meth user that gets the covid-19 vaccine?
description: Answer (1 of 7): Let me say this first, I discussed the vaccine with my Dr. first who is aware of my methamphetamine use. I've had the first of the Phizer vaccine and I am scheduled for the second shot July 2. First shot left injection sight sore for a few days. Next day felt achy and feverish, ...
